name: NAISARG HALVADIYA
bio: Transforming Insights into Impact: A Data-Savvy Software Engineer
brief: As a software engineer adept at harnessing data, I specialize in transforming intricate data insights into impactful, real-world solutions. My expertise spans full-stack development and data science, allowing me to innovate and drive forward-thinking projects. With a proven track record in leveraging data to enhance user experiences and streamline processes, I am dedicated to pushing the boundaries of technology to solve real-world problems efficiently and effectively.

projects.title: EduBridge
projects.description: A learning management system built with React.js and Node.js.

projects.title: FlareGraph
projects.description: A web app for visualizing fire incidents using Plotly and Python Dash.

projects.title: KnowledgeGrid
projects.description: A knowledge-sharing platform built with PHP and MongoDB, featuring Python algorithms for keyword extraction.

projects.title: AllocMate
projects.description: An automation tool for project allocation and evaluation at universities using JSP, Servlets, JavaScript, and DBMS.

achievements: Led lectures and office hours for 135+ students in web development technologies, boosting engagement by 40%. Automated 35% of grading with a custom script, saving 5 hours weekly.
Selected from over 2500 applicants, developed a discussion forum using Vite (ReactJS), NodeJS, and MySQL, enhancing user engagement by 25%. Gained expertise in Git workflows, CI/CD, and REST APIs.
Built and deployed a CMS platform with React.js and Node.js, generating over $500K in revenue. Led a team to create a work tracking app, reducing review time by 50% with Angular and PostgreSQL.

education.degree: M.S. in Data Science and AI
